footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Rosaria | Update Date: 10/04/2022 | Editor: Sew#2409

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value: __Staff of Scarlet Sands__ The weapons high amounts of Crit Rate and Elemental Mastery conversion make it the best choice for reverse melt Rosaria who benefits from all 3 stats.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value: Staff of Homa, Deathmatch, R5 Wavebreaker's Fin, r5 Dragon's Bane, Primordial Jade Winged-Spear, R1 Wavebreaker's Fin, R1 Dragon's bane

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> Elemental Mastery or ATK%|<goblet>  Cryo DMG Bonus |<circlet>  CRIT Rate or CRIT DMG

fields.name: Substats Priority
fields.value: Energy Recharge|CRIT Rate or CRIT DMG|Elemental Mastery|ATK%

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Rites of Termination
**2)** Elemental Skill: Ravaging Confession
**3)** Normal Attack: Spear of the Church
